entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
